error.login_failed: Login failed - please check host and/or password
error.no_data: Could not read any data from device
error.unknown_mode: Please check the IP/host or the provided Node Number - if you are sure that your information is correct, then the Tibber Pulse is communicating via an not-yet-implemented protocol - please create DEBUG log output and open an issue@github - I need sample data - TIA
error.unknown_device: Please check the IP/host or the provided Node Number - no device id could be detected, please check the URL: `http://admin:[BRIDGE_PASSWORD]@[YOUR_IP]/nodes.json`

data.name: Display name
data.host: IP or hostname of the Tibber Pulse Bridge
data.use_polling: Use old polling procedure / request data cyclically from Bridge
data.ignore_errors: Do not LOG errors or warnings while parsing data

data_description.password: [You find the password on the Tibber Bridge - below the QR-Code]
data_description.use_polling: Only check this option if the communication via websocket is causing issues for you.
data_description.scan_interval: Only relevant, when you enabled 'Use old polling procedure'
